ItemTooltips.blink: If your team consists of AOEish heroes such as Enigma, Tide or Sand King, Blink Dagger will help you pull off that wombo combo team wipe.
ItemTooltips.boots: Get this after bottle for the ms advantage. IF you're vsing a Pudge solo mid, your first 450 should be spent on this (important).
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: For early game stats and survivablity from charges.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Your first 600 should be Bottle for early rune control and lane dominance
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Other than the attack speed bonus, it provides mana for raze farming, HP for teamfights and damage from its AGI. Essential for SF in the mid game.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: You cannot be stopped once you have BKB. Use it to cast your ulti and fight in battles unharmed. Also provides HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: To deal with heroes with evasion eg. Windrunner, Phantom Assassin, Brewmaster.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Coupled with Shadow Blade, you will be able to two shot heroes if you get this early enough. Also a great luxury item once you have your core items.
ItemTooltips.manta: Allows you to push towers much faster. Also provides bonus movement speed, attack speed, HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Pick off lone heroes with the invis/ulti combo. Also allows you to escape ganks. Provides attack speed and damage and the ability to crit heroes.
ItemTooltips.desolator: To deal with heroes with high armor eg. Dragon Knight.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: If going the Pub Stomp build, get MoM to kill everyone in 2 seconds.
ItemTooltips.diffusal_blade: Get this if you're vsing a Warlock to get rid of his Rock Golem or if you're vsing Ursa to get rid of its ulti Enrage. Also provides some nice stats.
